alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Essex (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...An area of heavy rain showers will impact portions of eastern Caledonia and southern Essex Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy rain showers near Victory, or 10 miles east of St. Johnsbury, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... St. Johnsbury, Lyndon, West Burke Village, Guildhall, Waterford, Lyndonville Village, East Haven, Ferdinand, Granby, Kirby, Victory, Burke, Brunswick, Concord, Lunenburg, Maidstone, Newark, Newark Hollow, Lower Waterford and Maidstone State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
